definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: Native troops armed with a simple bow and a crude stone axe.
sentences.chinese: 雇佣弓箭兵装备猎弓和简陋石斧。

sentences.english: Its crew consisted of themselves and a boy to assist---truly a poor equipment with which to face a great and stormy ocean like the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 这只装备简陋的小船，就要驶向太平洋的暴风雨了。

sentences.english: A crude bed was covered by thick straws.
sentences.chinese: 一张简陋的大竹床铺着厚厚的稻草。

sentences.english: Adema cradles his one year old daughter in his arms, as he stands outside his hut.
sentences.chinese: 阿迪马抱着他一岁的女儿，站在简陋小屋的外边。

sentences.english: If you go camping you'll have to rough it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去参加野营，你就得过艰苦简陋的生活。

sentences.english: The bathroom facilities were poor and breakfast quick and basic.
sentences.chinese: 浴室设备很简陋，早餐服务很快，但选择不多。

sentences.english: She would have preferred the humble cart.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎宁肯坐那辆简陋寒酸的马车。

sentences.english: They make low beds, on a pallet or a spread of straw.
sentences.chinese: 他们以简陋的床具或草铺卧于低矮之处。

sentences.english: Fierce Welsh mercenaries, who fight unarmoured, equipped with a spear and capable of forming a defensive ring of spears.
sentences.chinese: 威尔士矛兵盔甲简陋，装备长矛，可列刺猬圆阵。

sentences.english: They wear crudely stitched-together clothing, and use simple weapons and tools like clubs and staves.
sentences.chinese: 他们穿着粗劣拼缀的衣物，使用棍棒之类简陋的武器。

sentences.english: My children call it a one-horse town.
sentences.chinese: 我的孩子们称它为设施简陋的镇子。

sentences.english: And in humble people, often from sad ziqi, lift head.
sentences.chinese: 而穿着简陋的人，常常自悲自弃，抬不起头。

sentences.english: I'm easy to send, a wlimb heform of art of words, a certain issue to the word.
sentences.chinese: 我很简陋打发，一句温心的话，一句关注的词足以。

sentences.english: The ugly little house was all the home that John eve had.
sentences.chinese: 那所简陋的小房就是约翰有过的家了。

sentences.english: They are much more spartan than the two shown to tourists,” Melvin said.
sentences.chinese: 它们比向游人展示的那些简陋多了，”梅尔文说。

sentences.english: Exactly, in such shabby country rooms, was once lived the descendant of notable family more than five years.
sentences.chinese: 就是这样极其简陋的乡村土屋，住名门之后五年之久。

definition: crude but simple methods (idiom); use whatever methods you can/to do things simply and thriftily/It's not pretty but it works.
